description: Scopri i migliori hotel a La Garde-Freinet, France. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: Boutique Provence Vineyard Escape with Wine Tasting Room
hotels.description: The romance of southern France is undeniable, best enjoyed from your base at HÃ´tel UP Ultimate Provence, a boutique spa-cation hidden among the vineyards in sun-kissed Var. The hotel is located on a 113-acre wine estate: while you're here, enjoy a tasting or two in the tasting room or learn from master sommeliers at the ultra-modern winery. Good food and wine go hand in hand, and at UP Restaurant, indulge in the chef's innovative creations crafted from seasonal and locally sourced ingredients.

seo.title: Hotel a La Garde-Freinet - France Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
